item.title: Cedar Key Travel Guide (Big Bend Coast/Florida West Coast/Florida/United States of America/North America)
item.description: This travel guide for Cedar Key, Florida includes a list of places to visit, hiking/biking routes, best things to do, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs, safety and health, along with transportation options and logistics, nearby destinations and excursions, and a week-long itinerary.

item.title: Machala Travel Guide (Coastal Lowlands/Ecuador/South America)
item.description: Plan your trip to Machala with this comprehensive travel guide, including a list of places to visit, hiking and biking routes, food and drink scene, where to stay, and more.

item.title: Yame Travel Guide (Fukuoka (prefecture)/Kyushu/Japan/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the culturally rich and naturally beautiful city of Yame in Japan with our comprehensive travel guide, including top attractions, best things to do, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture, and more.

item.title: Le Golfe-du-Saint-Laurent Travel Guide (North Shore/Quebec/Canada/North America)
item.description: Discover the beauty of Le Golfe-du-Saint-Laurent in Quebec, Canada. From cultural and natural attractions to hiking and biking routes, this travel guide will help you plan your trip and make the most of your visit.

item.title: Marakele National Park Travel Guide (Limpopo/South Africa/Southern Africa/Africa)
item.description: Plan your trip to Marakele National Park with this comprehensive guide featuring natural attractions, hiking routes, local culture, and more.

item.title: Lake Ontario Travel Guide (Great Lakes/North America)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, things to do, where to stay, and local culture of Lake Ontario, one of the Great Lakes in North America. Plan your perfect trip with our comprehensive guide.

item.title: Mati Travel Guide (Davao Oriental/Davao Region/Mindanao/Philippines/Southeast Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the vibrant culture and breathtaking scenery of Mati in this travel guide, featuring must-visit attractions, outdoor adventures, food and drink, accommodations, and transportation options.

item.title: Mount Sinai (New York) Travel Guide (Suffolk County (New York)/Long Island/Downstate New York/New York (state)/Mid-Atlantic/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Plan your next trip to Mount Sinai (New York) with this comprehensive travel guide, including a list of places to visit, hiking and biking routes, where to stay, what to buy, and more.

item.title: Jericho Travel Guide (Champlain Valley/Northwest Vermont/Vermont/New England/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best things to do, see, and eat in Jericho with our comprehensive travel guide. Plan your trip now and explore the natural and cultural attractions of this beautiful Vermont town.

item.title: Dead Sea Travel Guide (Middle East/Asia)
item.description: Discover the beauty of Dead Sea with this comprehensive travel guide, including its must-visit places, best things to do, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs, safety tips, and transportation options.
